extDescription.message: Filter any element on any web site with any condition with XPath and RegExp

descriptionHide.message: Matched elements will disappear if they meet the condition.

descriptionSearch.message: The filter works when these elements contain "Words".

descriptionSite.message: This rule is applied on matched sites.

dialogDelete.message: Are you sure to delete this rule?

errorHideXpathInvalid.message: XPath for "Elements to Hide" is invalid

errorSearchXpathInvalid.message: XPath for "Elements to Search" is invalid

descriptionEmpty.message: There is no rule.Make rules for your favorite sites.
